# Load figures
```{r load data,include=F,echo=F,results=F,message=F, include=F}
clade_forest <- readRDS("./data/regression/unadjusted_regression_clade_figure.RDS")
cognate_forest <- readRDS("./data/regression/unadjusted_regression_cognate_figure.RDS") 
dysbiosis_forest <- readRDS("./data/regression/unadjusted_regression_dysbiotic_figure.RDS") 
```

# Create cowplot
```{r,fig.height=12.5,fig.width=22.5}
fig3A <- ggplotify::grid2grob(plot(clade_forest))
fig3B <- ggplotify::grid2grob(plot(cognate_forest))
fig3C <- ggplotify::grid2grob(plot(dysbiosis_forest)) 

figure3 <- plot_grid(fig3A,fig3B,fig3C,labels = "AUTO",nrow=2,label_size = 18,rel_heights = c(1,1,1)) 
figure3
```

# Save figure
```{r}
ggsave("./figures/figure3.png",figure3,dpi=600,width=22.5,height=12.5,bg='white')
```
